all.map:
function (doc) { if (doc.type == 'event'){ emit([doc._id], doc); } else if (doc.type == 'voter
') { emit([doc._id], doc); } else if (doc.type == 'vote') { emit([doc.event_id, doc.vote, doc._id], doc); } }

byPhonenumber.map:
function (doc) { if (doc.type =
= 'event') { emit([doc.phonenumber, doc.state], {_id: doc._id, state: doc.state}) } }

voterByPhonenumber.map:
function (doc) { if (doc.type == 'voter') { emit(doc.phonenumber, {
_id: doc._id, state: doc.state}) } }

currentShow.map: function (doc) { if (doc.type == 'show' && doc.current == true) { emit(doc.current, {_id: doc._id, state: doc.state}) } }

votes.map:
function (doc) { if (doc.type == 'vote') { emit([doc.event_id, doc._id], doc.ev
ent_id); }}

votersByShow.map: function (doc) { if (doc.type == 'voter') { for (i = 0; i < doc.shows.length; i++) { emit(doc.shows[i], doc); }}}

votesByShowEvent.map:
funct
ion (doc) { if (doc.type == 'vote') { emit([doc.show_id, doc.event_id], doc.vote); }}
